dataController.triggerTitle: Your Responsibility as a Data Controller
dataController.triggerSubtitle: Understanding Your Legal Obligations in Handling Personal Data
dataController.modalTitle: Your Responsibility as a Data Controller
dataController.modalSubtitle: Understanding Your Legal Obligations in Handling Personal Data
dataController.modalContent: As Data Controller you must ensure that all data processing activities have a lawful basis. Common legal grounds include the consent of the data subject, the necessity of processing for the performance of a contract, compliance with a legal obligation, protection of vital interests, performance of a task carried out in the public interest, or legitimate interests pursued by the controller or a third party.

dataProcessor.triggerTitle: Your Role as a Data Processor
dataProcessor.triggerSubtitle: A Guide to Compliance, Accountability, and Best Practices
dataProcessor.modalTitle: Your Role as a Data Processor
dataProcessor.modalSubtitle: A Guide to Compliance, Accountability, and Best Practices
dataProcessor.modalContent: As a Data Processor you must assist Data Controllers in ensuring compliance with their obligations under data protection laws. This includes aiding in responding to data subject rights requests, data breach notifications, and conducting data protection impact assessments.
